org.apache.distributedlog.service

Interface DistributedLogClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistributedLogClientImpl

    public interface DistributedLogClient
    Interface for distributedlog client.

    • Method Summary

      Close the client.

      Create a stream with name stream.

    • Method Detail

      • write

        com.twitter.util.Future<DLSN> write(String stream,
                                    ByteBuffer data)
        Write data to a given stream.
        Parameters:
        stream - Stream Name.
        data - Data to write.
        Returns:
        a future representing a sequence id returned for this write.

      • writeRecordSet

        com.twitter.util.Future<DLSN> writeRecordSet(String stream,
                                             LogRecordSetBuffer recordSet)
        Write record set to a given stream.

        The record set is built from LogRecordSet.Writer

        Parameters:
        stream - stream to write to
        recordSet - record set

      • writeBulk

        List<com.twitter.util.Future<DLSN>> writeBulk(String stream,
                                              List<ByteBuffer> data)
        Write data in bulk to a given stream.

        Return a list of Future dlsns, one for each submitted buffer. In the event of a partial failure--ex. some specific buffer write fails, all subsequent writes will also fail.

        Parameters:
        stream - Stream Name.
        data - Data to write.
        Returns:
        a list of futures, one for each submitted buffer.

      • truncate

        com.twitter.util.Future<Boolean> truncate(String stream,
                                          DLSN dlsn)
        Truncate the stream to a given dlsn.
        Parameters:
        stream - Stream Name.
        dlsn - DLSN to truncate until.
        Returns:
        a future representing the truncation.

      • release

        com.twitter.util.Future<Void> release(String stream)
        Release the ownership of a stream stream.
        Parameters:
        stream - Stream Name to release.
        Returns:
        a future representing the release operation.
